DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect post operative period early feeding ( 4 hour surgery ) vs. traditional management ( feed 12 hour surgery ) uncomplicated cesarean section .
DOC.brief_title: Early Oral Feeding Versus Traditional Postoperative Care After Cesarean Section .
DOC.criteria: Cesarean section regional anesthesia , regardless gestational age . Use magnesium sulphate General anesthesia Pre gestational gestational diabetes Bowel injury surgery
